T02D1766:258b-1: shr'i de w'i k'a li s'a dhano pi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1766:258b-2: dpal lha mo nag mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog
T02D1766:258b-3: / dpal lha mo nag mo la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1766:258b-4: // dpal lha mo nag mo bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1766:258b-5: yo byad phun sum tshogs pas lha bsams la /
T02D1766:258b-6: de nas gnas dur khrod dam /
T02D1766:258b-10: dben pa'i sa phyogs su phyin la /
T02D1766:258b-11: de nas dang po phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa
T02D1766:258b-12: 'jig rten pa thams cad la gtor ma rgyas par
T02D1766:258b-13: btang / de nas ae'i mandala kun du khru re
T02D1766:258b-14: ba la dpangs su yang khru gang gi tshad du
T02D1766:258b-15: btang / bya / de la stegs bu rim pa gsum du bya'o //
T02D1766:258b-16: bar ma la zla gam gsum gsum du bya /
T02D1766:258b-17: tha ma la gru gsum dang /
T02D1766:258b-18: dang po la gru gsum du bya /
T02D1766:258b-19: rabs chad kyi thod pa re re'am /
T02D1766:258b-20: yang na gang yang rung ba'i thod pa re re bzhag ste /
T02D1766:258b-21: de yang thod pa'i steng du mngon par byas nas /
T02D1766:258b-22: thod pa'i nang du yang nag po re re ro sol kyis bri /
T02D1766:258b-23: thod pa'i phyi yang dmar po re re mi khrag gis bris /
T02D1766:258b-24: zla gam gsum gsum yang dmar por byug / gru gsum nag pos tshon btang ste /
T02D1766:258b-25: tshon btang ma legs na skyon 'di lta bu yod do //
T02D1766:258b-26: tshon sboms na slob dpon dang /
T02D1766:258b-28: tshon phras na nad mang bar yong /
T02D1766:258b-29: yo bar gyur na yul du 'khrug pa yong /
T02D1766:258b-30: bar chad par gyur na slob dpon slob bu myur du 'chi bar 'gyur /
T02D1766:258b-31: de bas re kh'a smyug ma 'bring po tsam du byas la /
T02D1766:258b-32: g-yas nas bskor zhing bri ste /
T02D1766:258b-33: tshon dgye ba yang gru gsum nyis 'gyur du dgye ste /
T02D1766:258b-34: nang gi gru gsum nag por bya /
T02D1766:258b-35: phyi gru gsum de dmar por byug / nang dang
T02D1766:258b-36: phyi gru gsum re re la rdo rje phyed ma
T02D1766:258b-38: thal chen dang khrag skam bsres pas /
T02D1766:258b-39: ae'i dbus su sngags sa bon gyi h'um bri /
T02D1766:258b-40: nang gi zur gsum la ma mo thams cad kyi
T02D1766:258b-41: srog gi snying po bhyo:re re bri bar bya ba
T02D1766:259a-0: yin no // de yang da du ra'i khu ba dang dur khrod @259a * //
T02D1766:259a-1: kyi sol ba dang ra khyi'i khrag dang /
T02D1766:259a-3: de rnams cha bsnyams la bsres te zhib tu btags
T02D1766:259a-4: la tshon rtsi dang sbyar bas dur khrod kyi ras
T02D1766:259a-5: la lha mo'i sku bris la /
T02D1766:259a-6: ae'i mandala gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D1766:259a-7: de nas spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad lnga tshang bar bshams te mchod pa dbul /
T02D1766:259a-8: de yang bdag dam tshig gi lha mo bsgom pa ni /
T02D1766:259a-9: dang po rang gi snying gar padma 'dab ma bzhi'am /
T02D1766:259a-10: yang na 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar dang bcas pa cig bsam /
T02D1766:259a-11: padma de'i ge sar gyi dbus su yi ge aam
T02D1766:259a-12: klad kor dang bcas pa 'od 'bar ba cig bsams
T02D1766:259a-13: la de'i steng du yi ge h'um rang gi gzi
T02D1766:259a-14: brjid kyis rang nyid me ltar 'bar ba cig bsgom
T02D1766:259a-15: / me des bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa can
T02D1766:259a-16: gyi lus bsregs nas thal bar gyur par bsam mo
T02D1766:259a-17: / // yang thal ba de'i dbus su zhi ba'i 'od kyis bsam par bya ba /
T02D1766:259a-18: sngon gyi padma'i snying po la gnas pa /
T02D1766:259a-19: srog gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge aom /
T02D1766:259a-20: de'i steng du bam bsam mo //
T02D1766:259a-21: de nas yi ge bam yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1766:259a-22: bum pa gang ba dkar po'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab pa cig bsam /
T02D1766:259a-23: de nas srog tu bshad pa'i yi ge aom de yis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'bab cing sbreng bas /
T02D1766:259a-24: yi ge kun gyi mchog srog tu bshad pa'i yi
T02D1766:259a-25: ge aa zhes pa'i chu des lhag par brtan zhing
T02D1766:259a-27: gzi brjid dang ldan par gyur nas /
T02D1766:259a-32: dur lta bur bsam par bya'o //
T02D1766:259a-33: de nas dpal lha mo'i mtshan sngags aom ma h'a k'a li de w'i k'a li /
T02D1766:259a-34: tranta k'a la ti tsanda r'u pi ni h'um phat /
T02D1766:259a-36: sngags kyi sa bon yi ge aa de las lhar bsgrubs te /
T02D1766:259a-37: dpal lha mo nag mo'i skur bsgyur zhing bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02D1766:259a-38: sku mdog nag mo char sprin nam /
T02D1766:259a-44: g-yas kyi dang po na ral gri //
T02D1766:259a-45: 'og ma na bhandha dmar gyis bskyil ba /
T02D1766:259a-46: kha tv'am ga dkrol ma ste /
T02D1766:259a-48: 'og mas tri sh'u la'i dar dbyangs 'phyar ba thogs pa /
T02D1766:259a-49: mi ro rengs pa khar bcug nas mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D1766:259a-50: spyan dmar po gsum bzlog nas lta ba /
T02D1766:259b-0: dbu'i @259b ral pa gyen du brdzes shing len bu g-yon du 'khyil pa /
T02D1766:259b-1: dbu skra'i ral pa la thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D1766:259b-2: snyan cha g-yas pa sbrul gyi mgul nas dril bu gsil ba /
T02D1766:259b-3: snyan cha g-yon pa seng ge'i ral pa dmar ba /
T02D1766:259b-4: rna ltag gnyis na me tog dang dar dmar nag gi cod pan 'phur ba /
T02D1766:259b-5: lha ma yin la sogs pa'i thod pa'i do shal byas pa /
T02D1766:259b-6: glang po che'i ko rlon stod g-yogs su byas pa /
T02D1766:259b-7: ba lang gi ko rlon chen po dral ba la
T02D1766:259b-8: re lde ser pos sham bu byas pa sku smad
T02D1766:259b-9: dkris pa / khrag dang zhag gi thig les tshom bur bris pa /
T02D1766:259b-10: klu'i rgyal po gnyis gshibs pas ska rags su byas pa /
T02D1766:259b-11: zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog gis brgyan nas /
T02D1766:259b-12: bod bu gva pa'i steng na rtsen skyil du bzhugs pa /
T02D1766:259b-13: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na skad dung dang 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs shing /
T02D1766:259b-14: ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za thams cad dbang du sdud pa cig tu bsgom mo //
T02D1766:259b-15: de ltar gsal ba dang de'i snying ga'i dbus su /
T02D1766:259b-16: thugs mar me 'dra ba la rang gi sor bzhi'i
T02D1766:259b-17: tshad la dbyibs sgo nga'i gzugs 'dra ba cig gsal
T02D1766:259b-18: bar bsgom mo // sgo nga de'i nang gi dbus
T02D1766:259b-19: su h'um nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan
T02D1766:259b-21: de'i yang h'um gi thig le ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam /
T02D1766:259b-22: h'um gi zla tshes zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam /
T02D1766:259b-23: de'i 'og tu h'um de las 'od zer byung bas bzlas pa'i yig 'bru rnams phreng bar gyur nas /
T02D1766:259b-24: h'um de nyid la blta zhing gsal ba dang /
T02D1766:259b-25: 'dris shing goms pa'i sbyor bas rtse gcig kho nar bsgom mo //
T02D1766:259b-26: de ltar bdag dam tshig gi lha mor gsal ba dang /
T02D1766:259b-27: grub pa'i gnas nas rang bzhin gyi lha mo sngar gyi de dang 'dra ba zhig la /
T02D1766:259b-28: 'khor ma mo gcer bu ral pa can thod pas se ral khar brgyan pa /
T02D1766:259b-29: lag pa g-yas pas mi'i snying thogs pa /
T02D1766:259b-30: lag pa g-yon pas bhandha raktas bkar ba 'dzin pa /
T02D1766:259b-31: snying gi dkyil na srog gi snying po bhyo:re re yod pa /
T02D1766:259b-32: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang bcas pa byon par bsam mo //
T02D1766:259b-33: de nas nam mkha' la spyan drangs nas /
T02D1766:259b-34: mdun du ae'i dbus su sngags kyi sa bon h'um
T02D1766:259b-35: dang bhyo:la so sor thim pas sku phyag rgyar bzhengs
T02D1766:259b-36: par bya'o // de la dgug pa dang gzhug pa
T02D1766:259b-37: dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba sngags 'dis
T02D1766:260a-1: dri shya dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya stvam sa ma
T02D1766:260a-2: ya stvam zhes brjod nas de nas gzugs la mngon
T02D1766:260a-3: du sku ston pa cig bsgom mo //
T02D1766:260a-5: aom h'um bhyo:ae a'ar li hr'i:dza:zhes brjod cing gzir ro //
T02D1766:260a-6: mngon du ma byung na bdag gi sems la ci
T02D1766:260a-7: 'dod pa ni khyod kyis sgrub par gyis shig ces
T02D1766:260a-8: bsgo ba'o // de yang las byed pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi dam tshig sbyin te /
T02D1766:260a-9: dam tshig kyang gur gum chu la sngags kyis btab la sbyin no //
T02D1766:260a-11: aom ha na ha na badzra sa ma ya aa dhi kra ma nan h'um phat /
T02D1766:260a-12: dam tshig gi chu sbyin nas bsgo ba /
T02D1766:260a-13: lha mo khyod dam tshig 'di las 'das nas bsgo
T02D1766:260a-14: ba bzhin du ma byas na rab tu gzir ba
T02D1766:260a-16: dam tshig gi chu 'di yang ha la ha la chen por 'gyur te /
T02D1766:260a-17: mthong bas khrag skyugs pa dang /
T02D1766:260a-18: rdo rje za byed chen pos snying dral te dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1766:260a-19: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis gsod pa la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1766:260a-20: khro bo za byed chen por 'gyur te /
T02D1766:260a-21: rdo rje me dpal 'bar bas tshig nas lus thal bar byas te /
T02D1766:260a-22: so so rang gi rnam pa gsal bzhin du dmyal
T02D1766:260a-23: ba 'bod sgrogs su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes dam
T02D1766:260a-24: tshig por / de nas lha mo la mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma dbul lo ;
T02D1766:260a-25: / aom h'um shr'i ya de b'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo: //
T02D1766:260a-26: aom badzra pushpe p'u dza spha ra na sa ma
T02D1766:260a-27: ye h'um phat ces brjod de me tog dbul lo
T02D1766:260a-28: // aom badzra dh'u pe p'u dza spa ra na
T02D1766:260a-29: sa ma ye h'um zhes brjod de bdug spos shangs
T02D1766:260a-30: // la dbul lo // aom badzra d'i pe p'u
T02D1766:260a-31: dza spha ra na sa ma ye h'um zhes brjod
T02D1766:260a-32: de mar me spyan la dbul lo //
T02D1766:260a-33: aom badzra gandhe p'u dza spha ra na sa ma
T02D1766:260a-34: ye h'um zhes brjod de dri thugs kar dbul lo
T02D1766:260a-35: // aom badzra nee wi dye p'u dza spha ra
T02D1766:260a-36: nasa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de lha bshos phyag
T02D1766:260a-37: // tu dbul lo // de nas ra rog po'i sha khrag dang /
T02D1766:260a-38: bya nag mo'i sha khrag dang /
T02D1766:260a-39: gzhan gyi yang sha khrag sna tshogs gang 'byor pa dang /
T02D1766:260a-40: chang la sogs pa bza' ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1766:260a-41: ma h'a mam sa kh'a hi /
T02D1766:260a-42: ma h'a go ro tsa na kh'a hi /
T02D1766:260a-44: ma h'a ba su ta kh'a hi /
T02D1766:260a-45: ai dam ba lim gri dn'a sa ma ya h'um
T02D1766:260a-46: phat sv'a h'a zhes brjod de gtor ma dbul bar
T02D1766:260b-0: bya'o // de ltar mchod pa @260b rdzogs par phul nas bstod pa bya'o //
T02D1766:260b-4: mi thod kyi rnga brdung zhing dbyangs snyan pos bstod pa bya ste /
T02D1766:260b-5: aom dpal ldan nag mo mi pham srid gsum bdag
T02D1766:260b-6: / rang don grub cing rnam thar sgor gzhol kyang
T02D1766:260b-7: // snying rje'i dbang gis gzhan don rjes thob cing //
T02D1766:260b-8: shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don byed //
T02D1766:260b-9: lha mo sku mdog nag mo char sprin mdog / mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum pa'i gzugs //
T02D1766:260b-10: shin tu rid cing keng rus lus can ma //
T02D1766:260b-11: zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku //
T02D1766:260b-12: ral pa gyen 'greng lan bu g-yon du 'khyil //
T02D1766:260b-13: skra rked sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng thod can //
T02D1766:260b-14: rna ltag me tog dar nag cod pan can //
T02D1766:260b-15: khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan rtsa dmar //
T02D1766:260b-16: mi ro rengs pa khar bcug mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1766:260b-17: rnam par gtsigs nas khrag la shin tu dgyes //
T02D1766:260b-18: snyan cha g-yas pa sprul gyi mgul nas dril bu gsil //
T02D1766:260b-19: gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma //
T02D1766:260b-20: snyan cha g-yon par seng ge ral pa dmar //
T02D1766:260b-21: dpa' bo khams gsum seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1766:260b-22: phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang po ral gri 'dzin //
T02D1766:260b-24: g-yon gyi dang po shakti mtshon cha 'dzin //
T02D1766:260b-25: 'og ma tri sh'ul mgul na dar dpyangs 'dzin //
T02D1766:260b-26: shakti ral gri mtshon gyis bsad pa yam //
T02D1766:260b-27: lha ma yin gyi mgo bos do shal byas //
T02D1766:260b-28: glang po che yi ko rlon stod g-yogs byas //
T02D1766:260b-29: smad ni ba lang ko rlon dras pa la //
T02D1766:260b-30: phyed ni re lnga ser po'i sham bus dkris //
T02D1766:260b-31: klu yi dbang po gzhibs pa'i rked chings can //
T02D1766:260b-32: zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog dag gis mdzes par brgyan //
T02D1766:260b-33: khrag zhag mang po dag gi tshom bus thig ler bris //
T02D1766:260b-34: bong bu gzhon mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu //
T02D1766:260b-35: bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs can ma //
T02D1766:260b-36: khams gsum skad cig tsam gyis skor bar byed //
T02D1766:260b-37: skad ni dung dang 'brug gi sgra ltar sgrogs //
T02D1766:260b-38: ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdud //
T02D1766:260b-39: lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang dag na gnas //
T02D1766:260b-40: dam pa'i sa nas gzugs sku gnyis gzigs ma //
T02D1766:261a-0: @261a * // ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon //
T02D1766:261a-1: tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs phyag byas ma //
T02D1766:261a-2: gzhan la dbang bsgyur 'dod khams ya mthar byon //
T02D1766:261a-3: dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dgyes 'khril ma //
T02D1766:261a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum tshal du byon pa'i tshe / lha rnams dbugs phyung brgya byin phyag byas ma //
T02D1766:261a-5: lha ma yin rnams phung bar byas pa'i tshe //
T02D1766:261a-6: lha min dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma //
T02D1766:261a-7: sku mdog ri rab che dang 'gran pa'i tshe //
T02D1766:261a-8: lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs nas nyi zla 'char //
T02D1766:261a-9: rgyal chen bzhi la sogs pas phyag byas ma //
T02D1766:261a-10: rgya mtsho'i gting nas me sbar mtsho skems nus //
T02D1766:261a-11: sa 'og dbang po kun gyis phyag byas ma //
T02D1766:261a-12: lha mo khyod kyis cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas //
T02D1766:261a-13: bdud dang gshin rje'i rgyal po 'dar zhing 'dud //
T02D1766:261a-14: ma mo srin mo'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rgod //
T02D1766:261a-15: dam sri'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing dam la 'dud //
T02D1766:261a-16: tsitta'i rin chen gur phub gzhal yas nas //
T02D1766:261a-17: nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa'i 'od zer 'bar //
T02D1766:261a-18: phyogs bcu 'jig rten dag gi bcud bsdus nas //
T02D1766:261a-19: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma //
T02D1766:261a-20: dug gi rlangs pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi //
T02D1766:261a-21: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams slong mdzad ma //
T02D1766:261a-22: de phyir nad kyi bdag mo dam la 'du //
T02D1766:261a-23: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bdud rtsi'i bcud bsdus nas //
T02D1766:261a-24: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma //
T02D1766:261a-25: bdud rtsi'i rlangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyi //
T02D1766:261a-26: bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad kyi rtsad gcod ma //
T02D1766:261a-27: bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal mo dam la 'du //
T02D1766:261a-28: gang zhig khyod la dad nam bas byams //
T02D1766:261a-29: de phyir nad bdag ma gcig sman gyi gtso //
T02D1766:261a-30: bdud rtsi lha mo khyod la rtag tu bstod //
T02D1766:261a-31: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i spyan snga ru //
T02D1766:261a-32: bdag gi deng nas 'khor ba ji srid par //
T02D1766:261a-33: dkar po'i phyogs kyi nad dang sdug bsngal sogs //
T02D1766:261a-34: zhi bar bya phyir tshe dang bsod nams spel //
T02D1766:261a-35: nag po'i phyogs ni bkug cing dbang du sdud //
T02D1766:261a-36: smyo 'bog bsad la sogs pa'i las 'di rnams //
T02D1766:261a-37: bstan pa srung phyir las 'di bsgrub par bgyi //
T02D1766:261a-38: 'di las 'gal na rgyal ba'i sku bslus pas //
T02D1766:261b-0: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rdo rjes mgo @261b 'gems shog
T02D1766:261b-1: / de skad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar dam bcas pas
T02D1766:261b-2: // khas blangs bzhin du dam tshig dgyes dgongs la //
T02D1766:261b-3: dam bcas bzhin du phrin las myur du mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-4: rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor bcas la //
T02D1766:261b-5: zhal nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phob la //
T02D1766:261b-6: nad sogs sdug bsngal tshogs rnams zhi bar mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-7: tshe dang dbang thang longs spyod rgyas par mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-8: zang zing lo tog 'bru yi phung po dang //
T02D1766:261b-9: rin chen rkang 'gro phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-10: bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod //
T02D1766:261b-11: bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad byed pa rnams //
T02D1766:261b-12: che ge mo zhes bya ba'i las ngan 'di //
T02D1766:261b-13: khyod kyi khong nas dug gi rlung bus la //
T02D1766:261b-14: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad rnams khong nas slong //
T02D1766:261b-15: pags gzhi sa la lhung la rdebs su chug /
T02D1766:261b-16: don snod lnga po khong khrag skyug tu chug /
T02D1766:261b-17: las ngan 'khor bcas brang chen brdung du chug /
T02D1766:261b-18: smre sngags tshe de gnam du 'bod du chug /'chi
T02D1766:261b-19: bdag gsad smyo 'bogs pas gsad par mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-20: gcan gzan mkha' lding la sogs ltas ngan phob //
T02D1766:261b-21: bstan pa srung ba'i las 'di myur du mdzod //
T02D1766:261b-22: aom ro ru ro ru bi tishtha ba dho tsh'i ka m'a la raksha s'i h'um bhyo: //
T02D1766:261b-23: che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat ces bzlas shing dam bdar /
T02D1766:261b-24: gtor ma sphreng zhing brgya rtsa brgyad dam //
T02D1766:261b-25: yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas //
T02D1766:261b-26: gzhan yang lha mo'i gzungs la sogs bstod pa mtha' dag bya'o //
T02D1766:261b-27: de nas lha mo'i rnal 'byor la gnas nas //
T02D1766:261b-28: don thams cad grub par byed pa'i snying po'i sngags 'dis bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1766:261b-29: myur bar ma yin bul ma yin //
T02D1766:261b-30: mi gsal ma yin gsal bar min //
T02D1766:261b-31: gug skyed nyams pa ma yin pa //
T02D1766:261b-32: g-yeng ba'i rtog pa spangs pas bzlas //
T02D1766:261b-33: aom h'um shri ya de w'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo: //
T02D1766:261b-34: a'a ra li hrim dza: zhes yig 'bru gsal bar byas te /
T02D1766:261b-35: sngags kyi bzlas pa thams cad kyang lha mo'i tshig yin par che ba'i nga rgyal bya zhing /
T02D1766:261b-36: rang gi sprul pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi zhal
T02D1766:261b-37: nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing bzlas
T02D1766:261b-38: pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D1766:261b-39: de lta bu thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur //
T02D1766:261b-40: de ni sngon du bya ba sngags te /
T02D1766:262a-0: @262a * // yang na gsum bzlas pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1766:262a-1: de yang sngags khri phrag bzlas nas gtor ma re re btang ste /
T02D1766:262a-2: khu tshur bcings te mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la /
T02D1766:262a-3: kha 'gram g-yas g-yon du mche ba ltar byas la /
T02D1766:262a-4: aom bya b'a batt'a li che zhes lan bdun nam gsum bzlas nas 'di skad du /
T02D1766:262a-5: dur khrod ma mo dngos grub zhal //
T02D1766:262a-6: gtum mo gtsigs byed yi dgas kha //
T02D1766:262a-7: dam tshig srung ma khrag dga' mo //
T02D1766:262a-8: lha chen dgyes mdzad khyed la bstod //
T02D1766:262a-9: ki li sgra sgrogs sbyor 'dzin ma //
T02D1766:262a-10: dur khrod ro yi mtsho dbus na //
T02D1766:262a-11: tshogs dang pho nya bcas pa ru //
T02D1766:262a-12: gtsigs byed gtum bdud mdzad la bstod //
T02D1766:262a-13: las bzhi'i dbang phyug sna tshogs gzugs //
T02D1766:262a-14: shin tu rid pa'i 'jigs gzugs can //
T02D1766:262a-15: lus la lpags gyon bong bu zhon //
T02D1766:262a-16: gnas gsum bdag mo khyed bstod do //
T02D1766:262a-17: ske cha lus rgyan thal bas mtshan //
T02D1766:262a-18: phyogs bzhi nyul zhing srog gi bdag / ya mtshan gyur nas de mtshan gyis //
T02D1766:262a-19: sngon chad la sogs 'dud la bstod //
T02D1766:262a-20: gsol cig bzhes shig dam tshig lha //
T02D1766:262a-21: gnas nas gnas su mdzad du gsol //
T02D1766:262a-22: bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dod pa //
T02D1766:262a-23: de ni khyod kyis 'grub par gyis //
T02D1766:262a-24: bdag gi las 'di ci byed kyang //
T02D1766:262a-25: de la kun gyis grogs gyis shig / grihna grihna /
T02D1766:262a-29: phrum phrum phrum phad sv'a h'a zhes brjod de /
T02D1766:262a-30: se gol lan gsum brdabs la gtang bar bya'o //
T02D1766:262a-31: sngags ma rdzogs kyi bar du de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D1766:262a-32: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar de srid du bzlas la ;
T02D1766:262a-33: / skyo bar gyur na yang bstod pa byas la mchod yon phul te mchod la phyag byas la /
T02D1766:262a-34: lha mo slar gshegs su gsol //
T02D1766:262a-35: dpal lha mo la sngon du mchod pa phul zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs par byas la /
T02D1766:262a-36: lha mos lung bstan cing mtshan ma thob pa'i rnal
T02D1766:262a-37: 'byor pas kyang dang po nyid du snying po'i sngags
T02D1766:262a-38: 'bum bzlas te / de nas bzod las la sbyar ro //
T02D1766:262a-39: de la smyo zhing bsad pa'i las bya ste /
T02D1766:262a-43: dur khrod kyi thal ba dron po dang /
T02D1766:262a-44: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D1766:262a-45: rdzas de dag gcig tu bsres te /
T02D1766:262b-1: lung bong gi gcin gyis sbrus te /
T02D1766:262b-2: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan byas la ldum bu med na yang /
T02D1766:262b-7: ra khrag sbyar la mi de'i rus rigs bla gang yin pa'i gzugs gro ga la bris la /
T02D1766:262b-8: bla de'i lus la de'i ming rus dang /
T02D1766:262b-9: sod cig pa'i bskul tshig dang ldan pa bris te /
T02D1766:262b-11: h'um che ge mo m'a ra ya m'a ra ya aun manta ku ru h'um phat ces bri /
T02D1766:262b-12: bla rdo dang sbrags la gzugs brnyan gyi snying gar gzhug / gzhan yang gong gi rdzas dang /
T02D1766:262b-14: mu zin ga po bsres te zhib tu btags la /
T02D1766:262b-15: lung bong gi gcin dang sbyar te /
T02D1766:262b-16: gzugs brnyan la khyab par bsku'o //
T02D1766:262b-17: de nas gcan gzan gyi thod par bcug la mandala
T02D1766:262b-18: gyi dbus su gzhag / de nas gang la bya
T02D1766:262b-19: ba de bkug cing gzugs brnyan la bstims te /
T02D1766:262b-20: mi de yin pa kho nar bsams la de la las bya'o //
T02D1766:262b-21: gsal shing la bskyon la gsad pa'i tshul du /
T02D1766:262b-22: 'dir lcags las gsal shing rtse gcig pa brdungs la bya'o //
T02D1766:262b-23: de ltar byas pa ni lha mo yin te /
T02D1766:262b-24: gzugs brnyan gyi rkub nas gyen du btsugs par phyung la gzugs so //
T02D1766:262b-25: de nas sngags 'bum phrag gsum bzlas na dgra bo brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1766:262b-26: de dbus bsam par bya ba ni /
T02D1766:262b-27: bsgrub bya de'i snying ga'i dbus su yi ge kam
T02D1766:262b-28: las gyur pa'i sdig pa kha dog nag po mi
T02D1766:262b-29: sdug pa cig / snying gi mar me'i dbus su
T02D1766:262b-30: zhugs nas / snying khrag 'thung zhing sha za bar bsam mo //
T02D1766:262b-31: gzhan yang dpal lha mo nag mo bsgoms pa'i thugs ka'i mar me la /
T02D1766:262b-32: nang gi h'um gi 'od zer las dza:dmar po sgril
T02D1766:262b-33: mar phyogs bcur 'phros 'dus de yongs su gyur pa
T02D1766:262b-34: las / lcags kyi spyang mo ral pa can gcig tu bsgom mo //
T02D1766:262b-35: des bsgrub bya'i snying rtsa'i dbus nas khrag rngub par bsam zhing sngags bzlas te /
T02D1766:262b-36: aom h'um shr'i de w'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo: //
T02D1766:262b-37: ma ma sha tr'um a'a mu kam m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat ces brgya rtsa re bzlas nas /
T02D1766:262b-38: rdzas ni ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1766:262b-41: gnod sbyin gyi lag pa dang /
T02D1766:262b-44: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D1766:263a-0: lan tshv'a'i phye ma rnams zhib tu @263a * //
T02D1766:263a-1: btags pa'i phye ma sbyar ba byas la /
T02D1766:263a-2: sngags bzlas nas gzugs brnyan la gdab /
T02D1766:263a-3: phur pa dmar lhang nge ba bsregs la snying gar gdab /
T02D1766:263a-4: de ltar mtshon rnon bos gzugs dum bur gtubs la /
T02D1766:263a-6: de du re'i 'bras bu yod na rab /
T02D1766:263a-7: med na yang lung tang tse'i 'bras bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs la /
T02D1766:263a-8: rtsab mo'i nang du btsags nas gzugs brnyan gyi phye ma dang bsres nas /
T02D1766:263a-9: dpal lha mo'i sbyor bas skra bshig gcer bur phyung nas /
T02D1766:263a-10: kha lho phyogs su bltas te tsher ma la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1766:263a-12: aom h'um shr'i de w'i k'a li ma h'a k'a li h'um bhyo: //
T02D1766:263a-13: ma ma sha tr'um a'a mu kam m'a ra ya
T02D1766:263a-14: aun manta ku ru h'um phat ces brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1766:263a-15: bzlas shing / rdzas dang bstan zhing bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1766:263a-16: de ltar byas na smyo nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1766:263a-17: ham gis thal ba de nyid blangs te /
T02D1766:263a-18: de nyid spyi bor btab na lo nyi shu rtsa
T02D1766:263a-19: gcig tu smyo bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bshad do
T02D1766:263a-20: // gzhan yang bdag gi rmi ltas su //
T02D1766:263a-21: bud med nag mo khros pa yis //
T02D1766:263a-22: gang zhig 'ching bas bcings gyur na //
T02D1766:263a-23: mtshan mo nag mor de shes bya //
T02D1766:263a-24: bsgrub bya nyi ma bdun na ni //
T02D1766:263a-26: gal te re zhig cung zad 'gror na yang /
T02D1766:263a-27: nyin zhag bdun du bsam gtan 'di bya'o //
T02D1766:263a-28: bsgrub bya lus po skams la rid pa /
T02D1766:263a-33: 'dar ba'i cha byad can zhig mdun du mngon sum du bsam mo //
T02D1766:263a-34: bdag lha mor gzhan pa'i h'um las 'od zer nyi ma dang me stag lta bu 'byung ba las /
T02D1766:263a-38: chem chem can du drag po'i yi ge h'um du gyur nas /
T02D1766:263a-39: h'um de las rdo rje'i khab tu gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1766:263a-40: rdo rje 'bar ba'i khab de dgra bo'i bshad khung gi sgor zhugs te /
T02D1766:263a-41: snying phug nas kha'i nang nas sam /
T02D1766:263a-42: spyi gtsug gi tshangs pa'i bu gnas phyung nas cher 'bar bar bsams te /
T02D1766:263a-43: snying po'i sngags kyi mjug la /
T02D1766:263a-44: che ge mo ha na ha na /
T02D1766:263a-46: h'um h'um phat phat ces pa'i sngags kyis khas bub tu lhung bar bya'o //
T02D1766:263a-47: de lta bus bsam gtan gyi lha yang 'chi na
T02D1766:263b-0: 'khor ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams la lta @263b
T02D1766:263b-1: ci smos // lha mo mu stegs kyi sgrub lugs //
